menuitem.name: _Default Media
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html' && !( dw.getDocumentDOM().getIsTemplateDocument() && dw.getFocus() == 'browser') && (!dw.getActiveWindow(true).browser || (dw.getActiveWindow(true).browser && !dw.getActiveWindow(true).browser.isLiveEditingInProgress()))

menuitem.name: _Media List
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html' && !( dw.getDocumentDOM().getIsTemplateDocument() && dw.getFocus() == 'browser') && (!dw.getActiveWindow(true).browser || (dw.getActiveWindow(true).browser && !dw.getActiveWindow(true).browser.isLiveEditingInProgress()))
